description:
You know YouTube is important. It is effectively the 2nd largest search engine. But where do you start when setting up your YouTube channel?

This course will show you exactly how to setup your channel from start to finish. If you're a YouTube beginner, or a intermediate student looking to learn new tricks, this course is for you. We will learn to link your videos with end card annotations, sell merchandise and send people to your own site with YouTube cards. We will also learn to monetize your videos, and how to create custom high converting thumbnails. If you are already doing that kind of stuff with your channel, do not take this course. For everyone else, lets get started!
title: How to Setup Your YouTube Channel Right the First Time
